Q_DESC:
Create an electricity board that charges the following rates to users 

a) For first 100 units : 40p per unit
b) For next 200 units : 50p per unit 
c) Beyond 300 units   : 60p per unit

All users are charged a minimum of Rs.500. If the total cost is more than Rs.250.00(GST) then an additional charges of 15% are added. 

Write a C++ program using to read the names of users  number of units consumed  print out the charges with names.
